author: tornike_chiboshvili
post: DAVID: Why worry? There are big names like Richard Dawkins, Sam Harris and others writing best sellers attacking religion. ELAINE: Many scientists don’t want to be perceived as having any connection with the new atheists. Many regard Dawkins, Harris and the others as having a negative reputation with much of the public, so even atheist scientists aren’t eager to be associated with them. The situation backfires, because the loudest voices then tend to be the most negative and the general public assumes those are representative of all scientists. That cuts down on the dialogue even more. Http://www.readthespirit.com/explore/701 science vs religion interview elaine howard ecklund.html.
title: Peter Higgs Criticizes Richard Dawkins
